title: 1 MAGIC DOOR
subtitle: You find a glowing door in a tree! Peeking through the keyhole, what excites you the most?

options.text: A LIVELY PARTY WITH GAMES AND SNACKS!
A PEACEFUL GARDEN FULL OF MAGICAL CREATURES TO WATCH OVER
A TRAINING GROUND WHERE HEROES LEARN NEW SKILLS!
GIANT TRAMPOLINE PARK WHERE YOU CAN JUMP

title: 2 Magical Buddy
subtitle: You step through the door and meet a wizard who offers you a companion. Which one do you pick?

options.text: A watchful phoenix soaring high above
A wise unicorn who loves solving puzzles
A gentle fairy who gives the best hugs
A playful dragon who knows all the fun tricks!

title: 3 Missing Bridge
subtitle: Your path leads to a broken rainbow bridge. How will you make it across?

options.text: Observe carefully and find the safest way
Take your time and plan every step
Work together to build a new bridge
Find a clever and fun way to bounce across!

title: 4 Lost Forest Friends
subtitle: As you cross, lost forest creatures appear, looking to you for help. What do you do?

options.text: Guide them patiently and calmly
Make it into a fun game while helping!
Keep watch and protect them from danger
Use your smarts to find the quickest route

title: 5 Enchanted Party
subtitle: After helping, you're invited to a magical forest party! What do you do?

options.text: Make sure everyone feels welcome and happy
Find a quiet spot to enjoy from a distance
Show off your cool tricks!
Help set everything up just right

title: 6 Sudden Storm!
subtitle: Mid-party, a storm rolls in! Everyone looks to you for guidance. What do you do?

options.text: Stay calm and guide everyone to safety
Keep watch and protect everyone
Turn it into an adventure and keep spirits high!
Find the quickest and safest route

title: 7 Cloud Obstacle
subtitle: As the storm clears, a floating path appears. How do you cross it?

options.text: Leap across with confidence
Observe and find the safest route
Step carefully, trusting your instincts
Dance your way across for fun!

title: 8 Puzzle Challenge!
subtitle: At the end of the path, a glowing puzzle blocks your way. How do you solve it?

options.text: Use logic and intelligence to figure it out
Defend the puzzle while others work on it
Try every fun and silly solution you can think of!
Work together and combine ideas with friends
Stay calm and think it through carefully

title: 9 Hidden Treasure
subtitle: Solving the puzzle reveals a locked treasure chest! How do you open it?

options.text: Study the lock and figure out how to unlock it
Use your strength to break it open!
Try a fun spell and see what happens!
Stand guard while someone else solves it
Work together with friends to solve it!

title: 10 Lost Puppy
subtitle: Inside the chest, you don’t find gold—but a small, lost puppy! What do you do?

options.text: Gently guide them home with patience
Protect them from any dangers along the way
Lead them on a fun adventure home!
Comfort them with cuddles and kindness
Use your smarts to find the fastest way home
